      • getDateDifference

        public int getDateDifference​(java.lang.String date)
        Get the time difference in month between input date to current Japan local time
        Parameters:
        date - : format should be "yyyymmdd". it should be Japan local time
        Returns:
        : date difference in month, the value will be -1 if it is bigger than 12 or input date is later than current time.

        Returns:
